explains: 解放，释放（liberate 的现在分词）

sentences.en: In a way, that could be liberating for families.
sentences.cn: 在某种程度上，这可能是家庭的解放。

sentences.en: Antiwar people told them that the civil war was not about saving the unity of the federation, but about liberating black slaves.
sentences.cn: 反战人士对他们说，这场内战不是为了挽救联邦的统一，而是为了解放黑人奴隶。

sentences.en: Many of the home electric goods which are advertised as liberating the modern woman tend to have the opposite effect, because they simply change the nature of work instead of eliminating it.
sentences.cn: 许多被宣传为解放了现代女性的家用电器往往起到了相反的作用，因为它们只是改变了工作的性质，而不是消除了它。
